description: This is a dangerous tool !! If you really are not sure why you want to change any of the settings this app can change, then I strongly recommend not using it AT ALL! The default settings that the tool opens with ARE NOT the default settings for Ubuntu/Kubuntu. Executing the tool with the default settings will effect video/audio, GUIs and USB interface and boot configurations that will cause the machine to be unstable. I could not get it to run without error on either of my machines running Kubuntu 23.10 on a Dell Insprion laptop and a Lenovo Ideapad. There are too many settings in this tool that can make your PC/Laptop unstable.
Галочки можно ставить, но оно как-то не влияет на работу системы.
